data.meta_description: Explore reviews, rankings, SAT/ACT test scores, popular colleges, and statistics for Oldenburg Academy of the Immaculate Conception in IN.
data.text: I am a parent of students who have graduated from Oldenburg Academy and am grateful for the education and experiences they had at OA. They were educated in a safe, supportive, caring environment where each individual was seen and heard. The confident and independent individuals that I see now as they are finding their way in this world, have a lot to do with the solid 4 years they had during some of the most important years of their life.
